name: @incremental.design/device-input-event-handlers
description: Handlers for `DeviceMotionEvent` `DeviceOrientationEvent` `DragEvent` `FocusEvent` `GamepadEvent` `KeyboardEvent` `MouseEvent` `TouchEvent` and `WheelEvent`. These handlers normalize and filter event details to make them easier to interpret.
author: Ajay Ganapathy <ajay@incremental.design>
